metadata.analyst_notes: This case demonstrates highly sophisticated extraction tactics, particularly the use of an accomplice (Tina) offering to 'help' pay fees. This creates a false sense of partnership and makes successive demands seem more reasonable. The $1.2M+ loss is among the highest recorded in pig butchering cases and shows how phantom profits can drive victims to pay amounts far exceeding their initial deposits.
